subject: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Greetings, Good Morning and  how are you doing? It's a pleasure to  write you this email .
I have something to discuss with you regarding a recent development. Kindly get back to me so I can
explain more details on the subject matter in regards to this conversation.
I'll be looking forward to reading from you note this matter is of importance
have a blessed week ahead.
 
Regards,
Rebecca Dosu.

subject: Re:    Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello Rebecca,

Good morning! I hope you're doing well. Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm curious to know what you would like to discuss. Could you please provide me with more details about the subject matter? I'm interested in learning more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Thank you very much for your email it was read and well noted, how are you
doing today it's a pleasure to write you this email, and the purpose of my
email will be plain and understandable to you, I was assigned to make
contact to you by the government of Ghana as a result of information
gathered on your behalf in regards to many failed attempts to receive your
funds that has been in Ghana for so many years i'm also sorry for my late
response due to weekends and other official duties,

The said funds has a lot history of a back and forth trial and error
process carried out by some scrupulous and unprofessional personnel and
sometimes greed, it happens that due to your absence people take advantage
of that to swindle you,

Least I forget I'm Ms Rebecca Dosu the current general manager of Ecobank
Westlands , your funds are worth 33,898,835.00 USD which is currently in a
liquidated account, you will have to fill the below details for the setting
up of your New Non Residential account, as stated initially your funds are
in a liquidated account it's still available for claim due to thorough
investigations by the
government of Ghana and a hired top financial firm and all informations
indicated that indeed you're the rightful Beneficiary (owner) of the
mentioned funds above and still eligible to claim your funds once every
documentation process has been completed.

Once your account has been set up the next in line of actions is it to
setup an online account , you'll also be issued with A MasterCard which has
a Validity date of about 4 years and a huge daily limit to enable you
withdraw funds and with the help of online access you can wire huge chunk
of your funds to any designated account but must be in line with the daily
limits of the recipient account and receivers bank policy.

Personal Details
Title:
Surname:
First Name:
Other Name:
Occupation:
Gender:
Date Of Birth:
Nationality:
Marital Status:
Place Of Birth:
Residential Address:
for possible delivery purpose

Tel N°:
Currency used in your country:

Form Of Identification:
Id N°:
Issue Date:
Expiry Date:

Ms  Rebecca Dosu
General manager
Ecobank   Westlands   Branch
Accra Ghana.

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello Ms. Rebecca Dosu,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I hope you are doing well too. I must admit, I am a bit surprised to receive an email like this, but I am interested in learning more about it.

Could you please explain to me in more detail how my funds ended up in Ghana? I don't recall having any business or financial dealings there.

Also, what exactly is a "New Non account"? How does it differ from a regular bank account?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these matters.

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Good to hear from you i'm so sorry for my late response, your funds got
here as a result of funds recovered by the Bureau of National investigation
of
Ghana Money that was stolen from other countries with the name of Ghana
government most of this funds are inheritance funds as to where exactly
your funds was recovered from i must be sincere with you i have no clue as
explained on my previous email most of the details are in piece and you
can't make sense of them going through these details,

A New Non Residential account is a normal and regular account but the
difference is, this Non residential account is only used by customers who
are abroad and not present here in Ghana. Hopefully I was able to explain
this very well.
Regards

Ms. Rebecca Dosu
General manager
Ecobank  Westlands   Branch
Accra Ghana.

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Thank you for your message, Ms. Rebecca Dosu. I appreciate the information about the funds recovered by the Bureau of National Ghana Money. Can you please provide more details on how the funds were recovered and what steps are needed for me to access them through the Non account?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Thank you for your response, your  funds were recovered when the minister
of Finance was doing a cleans up of the banking sector where many banks and
several microfinance in their hundreds were closed down and other banks
consolidated, after that the introduction of account updating came where
many
fraudulent account and account belonging to several foreign beneficiaries
was discovered you happens to be one of the lucky one that can still reclaim
their funds,

what you have to do now is fill the necessary details below so we can
proceed

Personal Details

Ms  Rebecca Dosu

Accra Ghana.

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Thank you for sharing this information. Can you provide more details about the process of reclaiming the funds? How long does it usually take for the funds to be delivered once the necessary details are filled out?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
The process of reclaiming the funds is as simply as setting up the account
for you then with the card and online access you can securely access your
fund,
once the details are filled within the next 48 hours you will have access
to your funds provided you're  quick in responding to the process
Regards

Ms. Rebecca Dosu
General manager
Ecobank  Westlands   Branch
Accra Ghana.

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details on how the account setup process works and what steps are involved in accessing the funds securely?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body: Do you have a personal account?

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello! Yes, I do have a personal account. What information are you looking to share or discuss regarding personal accounts?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
The reason I asked you is because I wanted to find out if you've ever
created an account it's the same process, like I explained earlier on it's
a no normal regular account the creation process are the same all we need
are the required information as listed previously

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Oh, I see. Could you please clarify what the required information is for creating this account? I want to make sure I have everything ready before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing the details. Could you please provide more information about why my ID is needed for possible delivery purposes? I want to make sure I understand the process clearly.

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Your ID is needed not just for delivery purposes every bank customer has a
copy of there ID attached to their accounts for identification purposes

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. Can you tell me more about why the ID is needed for delivery and bank accounts? How does it help with security or verification?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
As I said your ID is not needed for delivery purposes only and may not be
needed for delivery at all it is needed for your account setup which is
something that's normal, it serve as a security and verification medium
because without your ID on your account anyone can claim to be you, once
your ID is in your account yourself or anyone who cliams to be has to
provide an ID which will then be checked for detailed  accuracy of same
personality I'm sure this has answers all your questions if you are
serious about this kindly send your information as requested thank you

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. I appreciate your explanation about the ID requirement for account setup and security purposes. Can you provide more details on how my information will be used to ensure the security of my account?

Best wishes,
Jessie

subject: Re: Greetings, Good Morning and
body: Just like your ID same applies

Best wishes,
